section.title: Setting a Default Host Filter
section.para: Set the default filter for viewing your hosts.

procedure.title: To Set the Default Host Filter

step.para: From the Filters accordion on the left, click on the filter to use.
Click Set Default at the top of the filters list.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The default filter is set and marked by a green star next to its name.
